description:
This is the second Sinnoh Now camera crew that Ash and his friends encountered in Sinnoh. The crew seems to be lead by http://anidb.net/ch24233 [Rhonda].
In episode 44 (in the dub) the microphone carrier is called Jack. He keeps banging the microphone against Rhonda`s head.
name: Sinnoh Now Cameraman 2
